import { Container } from '@material-ui/core'; import { Switch } from 'antd'; import { Field, Formik } from 'formik'; import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Col, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { UserContext } from '../../context/provider'; import ConfigApi from '../../utils/config-api'; import './marketSetting.scss' const MarketSettingDetail = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [cryptoItem, setCryptoItem] = useState(); const [input, setInput] = React.useState(cryptoItem?.Value.is_active); const [addNetwork, setAddNetwork] = useState(false); const cryptoContext = useContext(UserContext); useEffect(() => { if (id) { cryptoContext.configData?.map(item => item.Value.symbol === id && setCryptoItem(item)) } }, [id, cryptoContext.configData]); return (
{console.log("id", cryptoItem)}
